EmailTemplate.name: DR 2016 - Link to Photos
EmailTemplate.subject: Link to Your Trip Photos
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Everyone,
Here is the link to your trip photos: http://media.livedifferent.com/?c=336&k=fb515b4337
How did your trip go? I hope everyone had a great time making new friends, meeting the families, and creating some change in the community. I loved seeing all of your photos and sad that I couldn't meet some of you in person. But really happy with everyone's work ethic! Our staff has said nothing but great things!
Have an awesome rest of your summer!
Joy Yu
